text:
[Verse]
City lights are shining bright
In the night it feels so right
Dancing through the streets tonight
Everything will be alright

[Verse 2]
Neon signs and buzzing streets
People moving to the beats
Rhythms in the air we meet
Feel the music through our feet

[Chorus]
Oh-oh city lights
Guide us through the night
We're gonna shine so bright
Dance until the morning light

[Verse 3]
Wandering through avenues
Colors blending hues with blues
Every step we take it's true
Magic's in the city views

[Bridge]
Echoes of a life so grand
Every moment we command
Lost inside this urban land
Take my heart and hold my hand

[Chorus]
Oh-oh city lights
Guide us through the night
We're gonna shine so bright
Dance until the morning light
title: City Lights
